ingredients: 1 C. Unbleached All-Purpose Flour (You may need to add more in while kneading)
2 T. Olive Oil + Extra for Brushing
2 C. Dried Pasta (I used Shells and they worked perfectly!)
½ C. Raw Cashews, Soaked for at least 30 minutes
½ C. Vegetable Broth or Water
1-2 C. Baby Kale or Whatever Greens you prefer
¼ C. Pitted and Sliced Black Olives
